<title level="1" right="Rules">[Companion Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=770)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You might want to acquire items that benefit an animal or beast that assists you. These items have the [companion](/Traits.aspx?ID=29) trait, meaning they function only for animal companions, familiars, and similar creatures. Normally these are the only items a companion can use. Other items can qualify, at the GM's discretion, but a companion can never Activate an Item.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
